dint.name: target
dint.description: Target Position in micron

dint.name: speed
dint.description: Speed in micron per second

dint.name: acceleration
dint.description: Acceleration in micron per second squared

int.name: axis_ID
int.description: ID of the axis to move 1 =Build platform, 2 = Powder reservoir, 3 = Recoater powder belt, 4 = Recoater linear axis)

int.name: axis_ID
int.description: ID of the axis to move 1 =Build platform, 2 = Powder reservoir, 3 = Recoater powder belt, 4 = Recoater linear axis)

dint.name: target
dint.description: Target Position in micro m oder micro degree

dint.name: speed
dint.description: Speed in micro m per second or micro degree per second

dint.name: acceleration
dint.description: Acceleration in micro m per second squared or micro degree per second squared

dint.name: recoateraxis_linear_start_position
dint.description: Recoating start position in micro meter oder micro degree

dint.name: recoateraxis_linear_target_position
dint.description: Target Position in micro meter oder micro degree

dint.description: Recoater linear axis speed in micro meter per second or micro degree per second

dint.name: recoateraxis_powder_speed
dint.description: Recoater powder axis speed in micro meter per second or micro degree per second

dint.name: recoater_axes_linear_acceleration
dint.description: Recoater linear axis acceleration and deceleration in millimeter per second squared

dint.name: recoater_axes_powder_acceleration
dint.description: Recoater powder axis acceleration and deceleration in millimeter per second squared

dint.name: o2_threshold_circulation_on_in_ppm
dint.description: Below this threshold the circulation pump can be switched on

dint.name: o2_threshold_circulation_off_in_ppm
dint.description: Above this threshold the circulation pump is switched off

dint.name: setpoint_in_percent
dint.description: Setpoint of the circulation pump

dint.name: setpoint_in_percent
dint.description: Setpoint of the circulation pump

dint.name: pressure_threshold_vacuum_off_in_mbar
dint.description: Below this threshold the vacuum pump is switched off

int.name: controller_ID
int.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

bool.name: isinit
bool.description: Flag if this is an init command or an update command, 1 = init, 0 = update

int.name: controller_ID
int.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

dint.name: derivativetime
dint.description: Derivative time of the PID controller in milli seconds

dint.name: integrationtime
dint.description: Integration time of the PID controller in milli seconds

dint.name: gain
dint.description: Gain of the PID controller in milli degree celcius of ppm per normalized output

dint.name: filtertime
dint.description: Filter time of the PID controller milli seconds

int.name: maxout
int.description: Max ouput of the controller in percent

int.name: minout
int.description: Min ouput of the controller in percent

bool.name: isinit
bool.description: Flag if this is an init command or an update command, 1 = init, 0 = update

int.name: controller_ID
int.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

int.name: stepheight
int.description: Height of the step to be applied during tuning of the PID controller in percent

dint.name: maxactvalue
dint.description: Max value of the range of the controlled variable during training degree celcius or ppm

int.name: minactvalue
int.description: Min value of the range of the controlled variable during training degree celcius or ppm

dint.name: systemsettlingtime
dint.description: Time for the system to settle at the start setpoint before the step for tuning is applied in milli seconds

dint.name: maxtuningtime
dint.description: Maximum time for the tuning including the settling time in milli seconds

bool.name: isinit
bool.description: Flag if this is an init command or an update command, 1 = init, 0 = update

int.name: controller_ID
int.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

int.name: dutycycle
int.description: Duty cycle of the PWM ouput of the build plate temperature control in percent

dint.name: periodTime
dint.description: Period time of the PWM signal of the build plate temperature control in milli seconds

int.name: maxFrequency
int.description: Max frequency of the PWM signal in Hz

bool.name: mode
bool.description: Mode of the PWM signal, 1 = pulse in the middle, 0 = pulse in the beginning of the PWM period

bool.description: Flag if this is an init command or an update command, 1 = init, 0 = update

int.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

int.description: Height of the step to be applied during tuning of the PID controller in percent

dint.description: Max value of the range of the controlled variable during training in percent, maximum is 100 percent

int.name: minactvalue
int.description: Min value of the range of the controlled variable during training in percent, must be positive

dint.name: systemsettlingtime
dint.description: Time for the system to settle at the start setpoint before the step for tuning is applied in milli seconds

dint.name: maxtuningtime
dint.description: Maximum time for the tuning including the settling time in milli seconds

signaldefinition.name: signal_manualmovementcontrol_enter
signaldefinition.description: Signal to enter Manual Movement Control mode.

signaldefinition.name: signal_manualmovementcontrol_leave
signaldefinition.description: Signal to leave Manual Movement Control mode into idle.

signaldefinition.name: signal_manualatmospherecontrol_enter
signaldefinition.description: Signal to enter Manual Atmosphere Control mode.

signaldefinition.name: signal_manualatmospherecontrol_leave
signaldefinition.description: Signal to leave Manual Atmosphere Control mode into idle.

result.name: istuning
result.description: Flag if auto tuning is in progress.

signaldefinition.name: signal_manualheatercontrol_enter
signaldefinition.description: Signal to enter Manual Heater Control mode.

signaldefinition.name: signal_manualheatercontrol_leave
signaldefinition.description: Signal to leave Manual Heater Control mode into idle.

result.name: istuning
result.description: Flag if auto tuning is in progress.

signaldefinition.name: signal_manual_controllertuning
signaldefinition.description: Signal to autotune a PID controller.

parameter.name: controller_ID
parameter.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_abort_controllertuning
signaldefinition.description: Signal to abort the autotuning of a PID controller.

parameter.name: controller_ID
parameter.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_referenceaxis
signaldefinition.description: Signal to put Manual Control into Reference mode. All axes can be referenced independent from each other.

parameter.name: reference_recoateraxis_linear
parameter.description: Flag if the linear recoater axis should perform a reference movement.

parameter.name: reference_recoateraxis_powder
parameter.description: Flag if the powder recoater axis should perform a reference movement.

parameter.name: reference_platform
parameter.description: Flag if the platform axis should perform a reference movement via the restored position.

parameter.name: reference_platform_absolute_switch
parameter.description: Flag if the platform axis should perform an absolute-switch reference movement.

parameter.name: reference_powderreservoir
parameter.description: Flag if the powder reservoir axis should perform a reference movement.

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_manualcontrol_exposure
signaldefinition.description: Signal to launch a single layer exposure

parameter.name: jobuuid
parameter.description: UUID of the job that contains the exposure layer.

parameter.name: layerindex
parameter.description: Index of the layer that should be exposed.

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_singleaxismovement
signaldefinition.description: Signal to launch the movement of one axes.

parameter.name: axis_ID
parameter.description: ID of the axis to move (1 =Build platform, 2 = Powder reservoir, 3 = Recoater powder belt, 4 = Recoater linear axis)

parameter.name: absoluterelative
parameter.description: Is movement absolute (1) or relative (2). Ignored if speed is 0.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: Axis movement target (absolute move) or Delta (relative move) Value of the axis in millimeters or degree. Ignored if speed is 0.

parameter.name: speed
parameter.description: Axis movement speed in millimeter per second or degree per second. MUST NOT be negative. Axis is not moved at all if speed is 0.

parameter.name: acceleration
parameter.description: Axis acceleration and deceleration in millimeter per second squared or degree per second squared. MUST be positive. Ignored if speed is 0.

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_singleaxismovement_change_layer
signaldefinition.description: Signal to manually change the layer.

parameter.name: layer_height_manual
parameter.description: Manual movement control Layer Height

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_manual_powder_dosing
signaldefinition.description: Signal to manually dose powder.

parameter.name: dosing_notches
parameter.description: Number of notches on the powder reservoir axis that are released per refilling step

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_manualmovementcontrol_recoat_layer
signaldefinition.description: Signal to launch the movement of one axes.

parameter.name: dosing_factor_manual

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

parameter.name: cardtype
parameter.description: Scanner Card Type (scanlab or raylase)

parameter.name: ipaddress
parameter.description: Scanner Ethernet Address

parameter.name: netmask
parameter.description: Scanner Netmask

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Connection timeout

parameter.name: maxlaserpower
parameter.description: Max. laser power (W)

parameter.name: laserondelay
parameter.description: Laser On Delay in microseconds

parameter.name: laseroffdelay
parameter.description: Laser Off Delay in microseconds

parameter.name: markdelay
parameter.description: Mark Delay in microseconds

parameter.name: jumpdelay
parameter.description: Jump Delay in microseconds

parameter.name: polygondelay
parameter.description: Polygon Delay in microseconds

parameter.name: simulatelaser
parameter.description: Simulate the laser control

parameter.name: pilotprofile
parameter.description: Excecute build job using the pilot laser

signaldefinition.name: signal_exposure
signaldefinition.description: Signal to launch a single layer exposure

parameter.name: jobuuid
parameter.description: UUID of the job that contains the exposure layer.

parameter.name: layerindex
parameter.description: Index of the layer that should be exposed.

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

parameter.name: ipaddress
parameter.description: IP Address

parameter.name: connectiontimeout
parameter.description: Connection Timeout

parameter.name: generalplctimeout
parameter.description: General PLC command Timeout (ms)

parameter.name: responsetimeout
parameter.description: PLC Response Timeout (ms)

parameter.name: vacuuminittimeout
parameter.description: PLC Vacuum Init Timeout (ms)

parameter.name: atmosphereinittimeout
parameter.description: Atmosphere Controler Initializing Timeout

parameter.name: axesinittimeout
parameter.description: Axes Init Timeout

parameter.name: controllerupdatetimeout
parameter.description: PLC Controller Parameter Update Timeout (ms)

parameter.name: togglevalvestimeout
parameter.description: Toggle Valves Timeout

parameter.name: startstoppumptimeout
parameter.description: Start or Stop Pump Timeout

parameter.name: plc_is_simulated
parameter.description: PLC is simulated

parameter.name: plcsimulation_circuitisclosed
parameter.description: PLC simulated circuit is closed

parameter.name: plcsimulation_filllevel
parameter.description: PLC simulated fill level

parameter.name: plcsimulation_recoateraxis_linear_ready
parameter.description: PLC simulated linear recoater axis state

parameter.name: plcsimulation_recoateraxis_powder_ready
parameter.description: PLC simulated powder recoater axis state

parameter.name: plcsimulation_powderreservoiraxis_ready
parameter.description: PLC simulated powderreservoir axis state

parameter.name: plcsimulation_platformaxis_ready
parameter.description: PLC simulated platform axis state

parameter.name: plcsimulation_recoaterisinfillposition
parameter.description: PLC simulated recoater axis state

parameter.name: cache_position_platform
parameter.description: Build Platform Axis Cache Position in mm

parameter.name: cache_position_powderreservoir
parameter.description: Powder Reservoir Axis Cache Position in mm

parameter.name: cache_position_recoateraxis_powder
parameter.description: Recoater Powder Axis Cache Position in mm

parameter.name: cache_position_recoateraxis_linear
parameter.description: Recoater Linear Axis Cache Position in mm

signaldefinition.name: signal_checkemergencycircuit
signaldefinition.description: Performs a check if the emergency circuit of the PLC is closed.

result.name: circuitisclosed
result.description: Returns true if the emergency circuit is closed.

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_checkpowderavailability
signaldefinition.description: Performs a check if powder is available.

result.name: filllevel
result.description: Returns the fill level of the powder. 0.0 means no powder left, 1.0 means powder stock is at maximum height.

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_releasedoor
signaldefinition.description: Releases the door.

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_singleaxismovement
signaldefinition.description: Signal to launch the movement of one axes.

parameter.name: axis_ID
parameter.description: ID of the axis to move (1 =Build platform, 2 = Powder reservoir, 3 = Recoater powder belt, 4 = Recoater linear axis)

parameter.name: absoluterelative
parameter.description: Is movement absolute (1) or relative (2). Ignored if speed is 0.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: Axis movement target (absolute move) or Delta (relative move) Value of the axis in millimeters or degree. Ignored if speed is 0.

parameter.name: speed
parameter.description: Axis movement speed in millimeter per second or degree per second. MUST NOT be negative. Axis is not moved at all if speed is 0.

parameter.name: acceleration
parameter.description: Axis acceleration and deceleration in millimeter per second squared degree per socond squared. MUST be positive. Ignored if speed is 0.

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_initaxes
signaldefinition.description: Initializes all axes.

result.name: platformaxis_initialized
result.description: Platform axis is initialized.

result.name: powderreservoiraxis_initialized
result.description: Powder reservoir axis is initialized.

result.name: recoateraxis_powder_initialized
result.description: Recoater powder axis is initialized.

result.name: recoateraxis_linear_initialized
result.description: Recoater linear axis is initialized.

signaldefinition.name: signal_leavewaitforreferencing
signaldefinition.description: Leave the waitforreferencing state in the plc state machine.

signaldefinition.name: signal_checkaxisstate
signaldefinition.description: Performs a check if axes are all powered and homed.

result.name: platformaxis_ready
result.description: Platform axis is powered and homed.

result.name: powderreservoiraxis_ready
result.description: Powder reservoir axis is powered and homed.

result.name: recoateraxis_powder_ready
result.description: Recoater powder axis is powered and homed.

result.name: recoateraxis_linear_ready
result.description: Recoater linear axis is powered and homed.

signaldefinition.name: signal_checkrecoaterfillposition
signaldefinition.description: Performs a check if recoater is in fill position.

result.name: recoaterisinfillposition
result.description: Returns true if recoater is in fill position.

signaldefinition.name: signal_reference
signaldefinition.description: Signal to reference the PLC Axes

signaldefinition.name: signal_recoatlayer
signaldefinition.description: Starts the recoating of one layer.

parameter.name: platformaxis_clearance
parameter.description: Clearance distance of the build platform in millimeter

parameter.name: platformaxis_speed
parameter.description: Build Platform axis movement speed in millimeter per second. MUST NOT be negative. Axis is not moved at all if speed is 0.

parameter.name: platformaxis_acceleration
parameter.description: Build platform axis acceleration and deceleration in millimeter per second squared. MUST be positive. Ignored if speed is 0.

parameter.name: layer_height
parameter.description: Current job layer height

parameter.name: recoater_refill_position
parameter.description: Recoater linear axis powder refill position in millimeter. MUST be positive.

parameter.name: recoating_start_position
parameter.description: Recoater linear axis recaoting start position in millimeter. MUST be positive.

parameter.name: recoater_linear_speed_travel
parameter.description: Recoater linear axis movement speed in millimeter per second during traveling. MUST NOT be negative. Axis is not moved at all if speed is 0.

parameter.name: recoater_axes_linear_acceleration_travel
parameter.description: Recoater linear axis acceleration and deceleration in millimeter per second squared during traveling. MUST be positive. Ignored if speed is 0.

parameter.name: recoater_linear_speed_recoating
parameter.description: Recoater linear axis movement speed in millimeter per second during recoating. MUST NOT be negative. Axis is not moved at all if speed is 0.

parameter.name: recoater_axes_linear_acceleration_recoating
parameter.description: Recoater linear axis acceleration and deceleration in millimeter per second squared during recoating. MUST be positive. Ignored if speed is 0.

parameter.name: recoater_axes_dosing_factor
parameter.description: Ratio between the acceleration/speed of the recoater powder belt axis and the acceleration/speed of the recoater linear axis

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_togglevalve
signaldefinition.description: Signal to toggle a single valve.

parameter.name: valve_ID
parameter.description: ID of the valve to toggle

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_switchvalves
signaldefinition.description: Signal to switch multiple valves on and off.

parameter.name: toggle_lower_gas_flow_circuit_valve
parameter.description: Toggle lower gas flow circuit valve (ID = 1), 0 = close, 1 = open

parameter.name: toggle_upper_gas_flow_circuit_valve
parameter.description: Toggle upper gas flow circuit valve (ID = 2), 0 = close, 1 = open

parameter.name: toggle_shielding_gas_valve
parameter.description: Toggle shielding gas valve (ID = 3), 0 = close, 1 = open

parameter.name: toggle_chamber_vacuum_valve
parameter.description: Toggle chamber vaccuum valve (ID = 4), 0 = close, 1 = open

parameter.name: toggle_zAxis_vacuum_valve
parameter.description: Toggle z-axis vaccuum valve (ID = 5), 0 = close, 1 = open

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_atmospherecontrol_init
signaldefinition.description: Signal to initialize atmosphere control.

parameter.name: o2_threshold_circulation_on_in_ppm
parameter.description: Below this threshold the circulation pump can be switched on

parameter.name: o2_threshold_circulation_off_in_ppm
parameter.description: Above this threshold the circulation pump is switched off

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_atmospherecontrol_update_gas_flow_setpoint
signaldefinition.description: Signal to update the gasflow setpoint for the atmosphere control.

parameter.name: setpoint_in_percent
parameter.description: Setpoint of the circulation pump

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_atmospherecontrol_start_gas_flow
signaldefinition.description: Signal to start the gasflow for the atmosphere control.

parameter.name: setpoint_in_percent
parameter.description: Setpoint of the circulation pump

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_atmospherecontrol_turn_off_gas_flow
signaldefinition.description: Signal to turn off the gasflow for the atmosphere control.

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_vacuumcontrol_init
signaldefinition.description: Signal to initialize the vacuum system.

parameter.name: pressure_threshold_vacuum_off_in_mbar
parameter.description: Below this threshold the vacuum pump is switched off

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_vacuumcontrol_start_vacuum_pump
signaldefinition.description: Signal to start the vacuum pump.

parameter.name: pressure_threshold_vacuum_off_in_mbar
parameter.description: Below this threshold the vacuum pump is switched off

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_vacuumcontrol_turn_off_vacuum_pump
signaldefinition.description: Signal to turn off the vacuum pump.

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_check_gas_flow
signaldefinition.description: Check the gas flow during the process.

parameter.name: atmosphere_controller_tolerance_ppm
parameter.description: Oxygen setpoint tolerance

result.name: circulation_pump_started_setpoint_reached
result.description: Circulation pump is started and oxygen setpoint is reached.

signaldefinition.name: signal_enablecontroller
signaldefinition.description: Signal to enable the build plate heater controller.

parameter.name: controller_ID
parameter.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_check_heater
signaldefinition.description: Check the build platform heater during the process.

parameter.name: heater_controller_tolerance_degree_celsius
parameter.description: Build platform heater setpoint tolerance

result.name: heater_controller_enabled_setpoint_reached
result.description: Build platform heater controller is enabled and build platform heater setpoint is reached.

signaldefinition.name: signal_check_atmosphere
signaldefinition.description: Check the atmosphere during the process.

parameter.name: atmosphere_controller_tolerance_ppm
parameter.description: Oxygen setpoint tolerance

result.name: atmosphere_controller_enabled_setpoint_reached
result.description: Shielding gas controller is enabled and oxygen setpoint is reached.

signaldefinition.name: signal_updatecontrollerPID
signaldefinition.description: Signal to save the controller parameters.

parameter.name: isinit
parameter.description: Flag if this is an init command or an update command, 1 = init, 0 = update

parameter.name: controller_ID
parameter.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

parameter.name: setpoint
parameter.description: Setpoint in degree celcius or ppm

parameter.name: derivativetime
parameter.description: Derivative time in seconds

parameter.name: integrationtime
parameter.description: Integration time in seconds

parameter.name: gain
parameter.description: Gain in percent per degree celcius or ppm

parameter.name: filtertime
parameter.description: Filter time in seconds

parameter.name: maxout
parameter.description: Max heater control output in percent

parameter.name: minout
parameter.description: Min heater control output in percent

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_updatecontrollerPWM
signaldefinition.description: Signal to update the controller PWM parameters.

parameter.name: isinit
parameter.description: Flag if this is an init command or an update command, 1 = init, 0 = update

parameter.name: controller_ID
parameter.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

parameter.name: dutycycle
parameter.description: PWM output duty cycle in percent

parameter.name: periodTime
parameter.description: PWM output period time in seconds

parameter.name: maxFrequency
parameter.description: PWM output max frequency in Hz

parameter.name: mode
parameter.description: PWM output mode, 0=middle, 1=beginning

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_updatecontrollertuner
signaldefinition.description: Signal to update the controller tuner parameters.

parameter.name: isinit
parameter.description: Flag if this is an init command or an update command, 1 = init, 0 = update

parameter.name: controller_ID
parameter.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

parameter.name: stepheight
parameter.description: Auto tuning step height in percent

parameter.name: maxactvalue
parameter.description: Max controller output during training in percent

parameter.name: minactvalue
parameter.description: Min controller output during training in percent

parameter.name: systemsettlingtime
parameter.description: Auto tuning settling time prior step in seconds

parameter.name: maxtuningtime
parameter.description: Auto tuning max time in seconds

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_controllertuning
signaldefinition.description: Signal to start the tuning of the controller.

parameter.name: controller_ID
parameter.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

parameter.name: stepheight
parameter.description: Auto tuning step height in percent

parameter.name: maxactvalue
parameter.description: Max controller output during training in percent

parameter.name: minactvalue
parameter.description: Min controller output during training in percent

parameter.name: systemsettlingtime
parameter.description: Auto tuning settling time prior step in seconds

parameter.name: maxtuningtime
parameter.description: Auto tuning max time in seconds

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_disablecontroller
signaldefinition.description: Signal to disable the build plate heater controller.

parameter.name: controller_ID
parameter.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_updatecontrollersetpoint
signaldefinition.description: Signal to update the controller setpoint.

parameter.name: isinit
parameter.description: Flag if this is an init command or an update command, 1 = init, 0 = update

parameter.name: controller_ID
parameter.description: ID of the controller, 1 = plate temperature control, 2 = shielding gas control

parameter.name: setpoint
parameter.description: Setpoint build plate heater in degree celcius or ppm

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode

signaldefinition.name: signal_abortcontrollertuning

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.

signaldefinition.name: signal_lockdoor
signaldefinition.description: Signal to lock the chamber door.

parameter.name: lockdoor
parameter.description: 1 = look door, 0 = unlock door

result.name: doorlockstate
result.description: State of the door, 1 = looked, 0 = unlocked.

result.name: success
result.description: Flag if the operation succeeded.

result.name: errorcode
result.description: Optional error code in case of failure.
